attributes.action: Make MPs, their direct dependants and spouses use the NHS over private care.
attributes.background: Members of Parliament make decisions that affect the future of the NHS that the vast majority of the public use.  MPs, their direct dependants & spouses should be legally required to use the NHS over private alternatives, therefore ensuring their commitment to patient care and prosperity of the NHS.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is up to individuals to decide which services to use, not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
